title: Motiv8 Ball
blurb: A twist on the nostalgic and whimsical Magic 8 Ball - Motiv8 Ball responds to a shake by revealing empowering and uplifting quotes.

title: Spotify x Wikipedia API Project
blurb: This project allows you to view an artist's discrography and brief description using the Spotify and Wikipedia APIs.

title: Brunch Buds
blurb: Brunch Buds is a restaurant review application created using ASP.NET MVC and Entity Framework, offering CRUD capabilities.

title: Snack Generator
blurb: Designed for when you're babysitting your nephew and you need to think of snacks to feed him.

title: Library CMS
blurb: This library CMS consists of a simple login process, a dashboard, a place to view/add/edit/delete users and books.

title: HAP Pitch
blurb: Proposed design for Health for All Partnership. Created in collaboration with UX/UI designers.
